sub_title: Assistant Professor at Maastricht University and Senior Scientist at Philips Research
summary: I am driven to further our understanding of cardiac arrhythmias, and to improve the diagnosis and therapy of patients with heart rhythm disorders. As an assistant professor at Maastricht University Medical Centre and a senior scientist at Philips Research, I combine my scientific curiosity with the clinical need for valorization. Ultimately, I aim to use my dual background as biomedical engineer and medical doctor to bring the fields of industrial engineering, academic science and clinical medicine closer together.
